## simon-5501-01-template.qmd, part 1

```{r write1}
library(tidyverse)
fn <- "simon-5501-01-template.qmd"
template <- read_lines(file=fn)
h <- str_which(template, "##")
g <- h-1
template[1:g[1]] |>
	paste0(collapse="\n") |>
	cat()
```

:::notes
The first few lines are the documentation header
:::
